channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Noise Luna Ring (Gen 2) review: a subscription-free Oura rival that’s solid but not standout
item.description: An updated version of the Luna Ring with a slimmer design, better battery and useful tools – but nothing game-changing in a crowded smart ring market.

item.title: 22 best deals from the Currys Boxing Day sale — save up to 40% on TVs, laptops, appliances, and more tech
item.description: Currys has launched another round of Epic Deals as part of its Boxing Day sale, so I've searched through and picked out the 22 best tech offers.

item.title: Fin et avec un écran lumineux, le Realme 14T est un smartphone encore plus accessible à moitié prix
item.description: Le Realme 14T s'accompagne d'un écran Amoled et de l'intelligence artificielle pour magnifier vos photos. Chez AliExpress, il passe de 299 euros à 136 euros.

item.title: The John Lewis Boxing Day sale is live: see 19 expert-picked deals on TVs, laptops, headphones, and more
item.description: The John Lewis Boxing Day sale is live and features excellent record-low prices on appliances, TVs, laptops, and other categories today.

item.title: Près d’un million de cadeaux de Noël en vente : les Français battent de nouveaux records
item.description: Les Français ne veulent plus conserver les cadeaux de Noël qui ne leur plaisent pas. Dès le 25 décembre au matin, des centaines de milliers de présents ont été mis en vente sur les plateformes d’occasion, comme eBay et Rakuten. La revente fait désormais partie des traditions, et les Français ne s'en cachent plus.

item.title: Ricoh GR IV Review: Everyone's Favorite Pocket Camera Gets Better
item.description: Ricoh’s cult-inspiring pocketable camera gets a small update, with important improvements in autofocus and image quality.

item.title: Could You Use a Rowboat to Walk on the Seafloor Like Jack Sparrow?
item.description: In Pirates of the Caribbean, Jack and Will use an overturned dinghy to hold air underwater. Madness or brilliance?

item.title: Microsoft, drop your AI obsession and give us what we really want: a lightweight Windows 11 that nails the basics
item.description: Windows 11 needs some serious work - but there’s a fantastic alternative I bet Microsoft won’t even consider.

item.title: This year I'm buying Blu-rays again like it's 2016 – here's why you should too
item.description: I'll be spending less on streaming in 2026 and buying Blu-ray instead. It isn't just about nostalgia either –here's why it makes sense.

item.title: How to find lost AirPods
item.description: Losing AirPods happens to the best of us. They’re small, they slide into couch cushions and they love disappearing into bags or pockets when you least expect it. Luckily, Apple’s Find My system makes it easy to track down misplaced AirPods, whether you dropped the case somewhere or can’t find one of the individual earbuds. With the right settings enabled, your iPhone can show the last place they were connected, play a sound to help you hunt them down or even guide you with on-screen directions. Here’s how to use Find My to locate lost AirPods and how to track down the left or right earbud if o...

item.title: Rançon de la gloire, ce géant des puces souffre d’une demande trop agressive… et des conséquences qui vont avec
item.description: TSMC commencerait-il à montrer des signes de faiblesse ? Sans fléchir pour l'instant, loin de là, l'entreprise souffre en tout cas de son statut de leader et des conséquences qui vont de paire avec une demande en semi-conducteurs qualifiée de « trop agressive ».

item.title: Sleep Number P6 Smart Bed Review: Advanced and Adaptive
item.description: This legacy brand brings its beds into the modern era with 100 firmness levels and in-depth sleep tracking.

item.title: Amazon fait un super prix ce SSD externe ultra‑rapide de 4 To avant la flambée des prix du stockage
item.description: À l’heure où les prix de la mémoire vive s’envolent et que la pénurie menace les composants, le Crucial X10 Pro se présente comme une solution de stockage rapide, robuste et abordable. Actuellement en promotion dans sa version 4 To, ce SSD externe devient un allié précieux.

item.title: US Trade Dominance Will Soon Begin to Crack
item.description: Savvy countries will discover there’s a way to mitigate the harm incurred by Trump’s tariffs—and it’ll boost their own economies while making goods cheaper too.

item.title: La dure prise de conscience de Microsoft : Copilot serait loin d’avoir le succès escompté (mais la firme dément)
item.description: Des sources chez Microsoft expliquent que la firme fait face à des chiffres décevants pour Copilot, mais la firme dément officiellement ces informations.

item.title: L’iPhone Air 2 en avance ? Apple serait pressé de corriger ses erreurs dès 2026
item.description: Rebondissement dans le calendrier d'Apple. Alors que les dernières rumeurs annonçaient un report de l'iPhone Air 2 au printemps 2027 suite à l'échec commercial du premier modèle, de nouvelles informations suggèrent qu'Apple pourrait finalement dégainer plus tôt que prévu. Le successeur du smartphone ultra-fin serait désormais attendu dès septembre 2026....

item.title: ‘We Ain’t Seen Nothing Yet’—Trump’s Mass Deportations Will Only Grow From Here
item.description: Militias and far-right extremists believed they would be central to Trump’s mass deportation plans. Instead he militarized law enforcement agencies.

item.title: I’ve been playing Plants vs Zombies for years, and this remake is the definitive edition — with a catch
item.description: Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted: Replanted pulls all the flora vs walking dead gaming together in definitive package, but arguably lacks the purity of the 2009 original game.

item.title: How Vince Gilligan designed ‘Pluribus’ to destroy every sci-fi trope
item.description: Gilligan and his crew gave us an inside look at how they built ‘Pluribus’ into a happy-ish apocalypse. Vince Gilligan spent a decade ruminating about his next TV series before he had a clear vision of what it was going to be. But through all that time, the writer/director, who is best known for creating Breaking Bad and Better Call Saul, knew one thing for sure: it had to be entirely different from what he’d made before. In fact, it had to be completely unlike any other show, period. ...

item.title: Data shows the ‘Made in USA’ brand still suffered under tariffs
item.description: Fewer shoppers are return customers of ‘Made in USA’ products. That’s because it still sends the wrong brand signal: expensive. In Denmark, a grocery store chain used a black star. In Canada, it was a maple leaf.
